title: VK API JSON Schema - methods
description: Contains JSON Schema documents explaining the VK.COM API - methods

methods.name: video.add
methods.description: Adds a video to a user or community page.

parameters.name: target_id
parameters.description: identifier of a user or community to add a video to. Use a negative value to designate a community ID.

parameters.name: video_id
parameters.description: Video ID.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the video. Use a negative value to designate a community ID.

methods.name: video.addAlbum
methods.description: Creates an empty album for videos.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Community ID (if the album will be created in a community).

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Album title.

parameters.name: privacy
parameters.description: new access permissions for the album. Possible values: , *'0' - all users,, *'1' - friends only,, *'2' - friends and friends of friends,, *'3' - "only me".

methods.name: video.createComment
methods.description: Adds a new comment on a video.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the video.

parameters.name: video_id
parameters.description: Video ID.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: New comment text.

parameters.name: attachments
parameters.description: List of objects attached to the comment, in the following format: "<owner_id>_<media_id>,<owner_id>_<media_id>", '' - Type of media attachment: 'photo' - photo, 'video' - video, 'audio' - audio, 'doc' - document, '<owner_id>' - ID of the media attachment owner. '<media_id>' - Media attachment ID. Example: "photo100172_166443618,photo66748_265827614"

parameters.name: from_group
parameters.description: '1' - to post the comment from a community name (only if 'owner_id'<0)

methods.name: video.delete
methods.description: Deletes a video from a user or community page.

parameters.name: video_id
parameters.description: Video ID.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the video.

methods.name: video.deleteAlbum
methods.description: Deletes a video album.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Community ID (if the album is owned by a community).

parameters.name: album_id
parameters.description: Album ID.

methods.name: video.deleteComment
methods.description: Deletes a comment on a video.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the video.

parameters.name: comment_id
parameters.description: ID of the comment to be deleted.

methods.name: video.edit
methods.description: Edits information about a video on a user or community page.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the video.

parameters.name: video_id
parameters.description: Video ID.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: New video title.

parameters.name: desc
parameters.description: New video description.

parameters.name: privacy_view
parameters.description: Privacy settings in a [vk.com/dev/privacy_setting|special format]. Privacy setting is available for videos uploaded to own profile by user.

parameters.name: privacy_comment
parameters.description: Privacy settings for comments in a [vk.com/dev/privacy_setting|special format].

parameters.name: no_comments
parameters.description: Disable comments for the group video.

parameters.name: repeat
parameters.description: '1' - to repeat the playback of the video, '0' - to play the video once,

methods.name: video.editAlbum
methods.description: Edits the title of a video album.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Community ID (if the album edited is owned by a community).

parameters.name: album_id
parameters.description: Album ID.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: New album title.

parameters.name: privacy
parameters.description: new access permissions for the album. Possible values: , *'0' - all users,, *'1' - friends only,, *'2' - friends and friends of friends,, *'3' - "only me".

methods.name: video.editComment
methods.description: Edits the text of a comment on a video.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the video.

parameters.name: comment_id
parameters.description: Comment ID.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: New comment text.

parameters.name: attachments
parameters.description: List of objects attached to the comment, in the following format: "<owner_id>_<media_id>,<owner_id>_<media_id>", '' - Type of media attachment: 'photo' - photo, 'video' - video, 'audio' - audio, 'doc' - document, '<owner_id>' - ID of the media attachment owner. '<media_id>' - Media attachment ID. Example: "photo100172_166443618,photo66748_265827614"

methods.name: video.get
methods.description: Returns detailed information about videos.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the video(s).

parameters.name: videos
parameters.description: Video IDs, in the following format: "<owner_id>_<media_id>,<owner_id>_<media_id>", Use a negative value to designate a community ID. Example: "-4363_136089719,13245770_137352259"

parameters.name: album_id
parameters.description: ID of the album containing the video(s).

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of videos to return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of videos.

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: '1' - to return an extended response with additional fields

parameters.name: sort_album
parameters.description: Sort order: '0' - newest video first, '1' - oldest video first

methods.name: video.getAlbumById
methods.description: Returns video album info

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: identifier of a user or community to add a video to. Use a negative value to designate a community ID.

parameters.name: album_id
parameters.description: Album ID.

methods.name: video.getAlbums
methods.description: Returns a list of video albums owned by a user or community.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the video album(s).

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of video albums.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of video albums to return.

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: '1' - to return additional information about album privacy settings for the current user

methods.name: video.getComments
methods.description: Returns a list of comments on a video.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the video.

parameters.name: video_id
parameters.description: Video ID.

parameters.name: need_likes
parameters.description: '1' - to return an additional 'likes' field

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of comments.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of comments to return.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort order: 'asc' - oldest comment first, 'desc' - newest comment first

methods.name: video.reorderAlbums
methods.description: Reorders the album in the list of user video albums.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the albums..

parameters.name: album_id
parameters.description: Album ID.

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: ID of the album before which the album in question shall be placed.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: ID of the album after which the album in question shall be placed.

methods.name: video.reorderVideos
methods.description: Reorders the video in the video album.

parameters.name: target_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the album with videos.

parameters.name: album_id
parameters.description: ID of the video album.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the video.

parameters.name: video_id
parameters.description: ID of the video.

parameters.name: before_owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the video before which the video in question shall be placed.

parameters.name: before_video_id
parameters.description: ID of the video before which the video in question shall be placed.

parameters.name: after_owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the video after which the photo in question shall be placed.

parameters.name: after_video_id
parameters.description: ID of the video after which the photo in question shall be placed.

methods.name: video.report
methods.description: Reports (submits a complaint about) a video.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the video.

parameters.name: video_id
parameters.description: Video ID.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: Reason for the complaint: '0' - spam, '1' - child pornography, '2' - extremism, '3' - violence, '4' - drug propaganda, '5' - adult material, '6' - insult, abuse

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: Comment describing the complaint.

parameters.name: search_query
parameters.description: (If the video was found in search results.) Search query string.

methods.name: video.reportComment
methods.description: Reports (submits a complaint about) a comment on a video.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the video.

parameters.name: comment_id
parameters.description: ID of the comment being reported.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: Reason for the complaint: , 0 - spam , 1 - child pornography , 2 - extremism , 3 - violence , 4 - drug propaganda , 5 - adult material , 6 - insult, abuse

methods.name: video.restore
methods.description: Restores a previously deleted video.

parameters.name: video_id
parameters.description: Video ID.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the video.

methods.name: video.restoreComment
methods.description: Restores a previously deleted comment on a video.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the video.

parameters.name: comment_id
parameters.description: ID of the deleted comment.

response.description: Returns 1 if request has been processed successfully, 0 if the comment is not found

methods.name: video.save
methods.description: Returns a server address (required for upload) and video data.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the video.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description of the video.

parameters.name: is_private
parameters.description: '1' - to designate the video as private (send it via a private message), the video will not appear on the user's video list and will not be available by ID for other users, '0' - not to designate the video as private

parameters.name: wallpost
parameters.description: '1' - to post the saved video on a user's wall, '0' - not to post the saved video on a user's wall

parameters.name: link
parameters.description: URL for embedding the video from an external website.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID of the community in which the video will be saved. By default, the current user's page.

parameters.name: album_id
parameters.description: ID of the album to which the saved video will be added.

parameters.name: repeat
parameters.description: '1' - to repeat the playback of the video, '0' - to play the video once,

parameters.name: video_id
parameters.description: Video ID.

parameters.name: set_thumb
parameters.description: If flag passed uploaded thumb will automatically set to passed video. Work only with video_id.

methods.name: video.search
methods.description: Returns a list of videos under the set search criterion.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search query string (e.g., 'The Beatles').

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort order: '1' - by duration, '2' - by relevance, '0' - by date added

parameters.name: hd
parameters.description: If not null, only searches for high-definition videos.

parameters.name: adult
parameters.description: '1' - to disable the Safe Search filter, '0' - to enable the Safe Search filter

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Filters to apply: 'youtube' - return YouTube videos only, 'vimeo' - return Vimeo videos only, 'vk' - return VK videos only, 'short' - return short videos only, 'long' - return long videos only

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of videos.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of videos to return.

methods.name: video.unpinComment
methods.description: Unpin comment of a video.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the video.
